message: Note for MacOS users of beta 2: you are encouraged to download the second version of the package that fixes the multithreading issue and restores normal performance.

Gaiaâ€™s online server is currently experiencing intermittent issues, which may occasionally cause Siril to crash when trying to access it. The crash has already been fixed for upcoming versions of Siril, but the server problem itself remains and is beyond our control. To work around this, please install the local Gaia catalog that we have built specifically for this purpose.
